text: The 2016 Shannons Nationals Motor Racing Round 1 was held at Sandown Raceway on April 1–3, 2016. It included Australian GT, Australian Formula 3, Australian Formula Ford, Kerrick Sports Sedans, Kumho V8 Touring Cars, Porsche GT3 Cup, Sports Racers and Touring Car Masters.http://www.thenationals.com.au/index.php?page=sandown ==Results== ===Australian GT Championship=== ====Qualifying==== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 90%" |- ! ! !
